message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product at the exclusive price of $15,000. This is a limited-time offer, so don't miss out on this incredible deal!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is high, but I'm only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This is a fair price considering the quality and potential of this product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe $10,000 is a fair price given my budget constraints. I would like to stick to that figure if possible.
